Package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph

Class UMLDocument

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLDocument
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: UMLDocument.java 825 2021-01-03 17:50:44Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.0.5") public class UMLDocument extends Object
The container for a UML diagram.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)

    • addClippath

      public final String addClippath(org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGRectangle clipRectangle)
      Creates an SVG <clipPath> element from the given rectangle and adds it to the SVG root element for this UML document.
      Parameters:
      clipRectangle - The rectangle that defines the clip path.
      Returns:
      The id of the new SVG <clipPath> element.
      See Also:
      • SVGClipPath

    • addConnector

      Parameters:

    • addSymbol

      public final boolean addSymbol(TypeSymbol symbol)
      Adds the symbol for a type element to the UML document
      Parameters:
      symbol - The symbol to add.
      Returns:
      true if the symbol was added, false if not.

    • addUse

      public final void addUse(org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUse use)
      Places a symbol in the output diagram.
      Parameters:
      use - The reference to the <symbol> element represent a type.

      public final String createId()
      Creates a new id that is unique inside the current UML document instance.

    • getSymbol

      public final Optional<TypeSymbol> getSymbol(Name name)
      Returns the symbol with for the type element with the given name from this UML document.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the type element.
      Returns:
      An instance of Optional that contains the symbol.

      Loads the CSS from the resources.
      Returns:
      The CSS styles.
      Throws:
